description: Refreshing orange salads are popular in the southern Mediterranean and are served alongside stews and grilled meat or fish.
keywords: Fruit salad,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Wheat free,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Orange Salad With Olives Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small medium red onion, thinly sliced
0.5 lemon, juice and finely grated zest

recipeInstructions.text: Place the onion in a bowl of cold water. Using a sharp knife, remove the peel and pith from the oranges, and slice thinly.
Place the oranges in a shallow serving dish. Drain the onion slices, place on a double layer of kitchen paper, and pat dry. Arrange the slices on the oranges. Scatter the olives on top.
In a small cup, combine the lemon juice and zest and the oil. Season to taste and drizzle over the salad. If you like, scatter over the rocket. Leave to stand for 5 minutes before serving.
